abstract: A new research unit at Microsoft has started to explore better ways to manage tens of thousands of computers at a time and save energy.
snippet: A new research unit at Microsoft has started to explore better ways to manage tens of thousands of computers at a time and save energy.
lead_paragraph: It was a server. The kind of server that would make a bishop kick a hole in a stained glass window.

abstract: Could EMC, IBM, Microsoft, Omniture or Salesforce.com be looking to make their own acquisitions in the Web content management industry, taking a page from Autonomy‘s proposed acquisition of Interwoven?
lead_paragraph: Could EMC, IBM, Microsoft, Omniture or Salesforce.com be looking to make their own acquisitions in the Web content management industry, taking a page from Autonomy‘s proposed acquisition of Interwoven?

headline.main: Taking Stock of Potential Web Management Deals

abstract: I keep getting messages about something called the “Normal.dot” file, which I never got before. What might be causing this and how can I fix it?
snippet: I keep getting messages about something called the “Normal.dot” file, which I never got before. What might be causing this and how can I fix it?
lead_paragraph: Q. I use Microsoft Word 2003, but after working on a really long document one night, I found I couldn’t open the file  or any other Word documents  the next day. I also keep getting messages about something called the “Normal.dot” file, which I never got before. What might be causing this and how can I fix it?

abstract: How does a digital recorder work? If I get one, can it automatically transcribe the audio files into text?
snippet: How does a digital recorder work? If I get one, can it automatically transcribe the audio files into text?

headline.main: From Your Lips, Right Into Text

abstract: During a recent research event, Microsoft showed off its vision for how humans will change their interactions with a wide range of devices.
snippet: During a recent research event, Microsoft showed off its vision for how humans will change their interactions with a wide range of devices.
lead_paragraph: At Microsoft, they call it “the fat finger problem.”
